summary: SummaryMedicube's PDRN Pink Peptide Toner is a glow booster toner powered by PDRN and 10 peptides to hydrate, smooth, and prep skin for optimal absorptionâ€”perfect for restoring glow and elasticity from the first step.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrates and preps skin for better absorption of following skincareRestores bounce and radiance with elasticity-boosting ingredientsSoothes and strengthens barrier to support daily skin recoveryFeaturesPDRN (Sodium DNA): Supports visible skin renewal and elasticity10-Peptide Complex: Firms and revitalizes skin textureWatery texture, Mild, low-irritation formula: Even suitable for sensitive skin typesResearch ResultsSkin Soothing improvement 2.352%Blemish improvement 1.078%Skin texture improvement: 3.694%Skin tone improvement: 6.418%Skin radiance improvement: 19.553%Skin moisture improvement: 53.552%Removal of excess sebum 13.091%Item 2645353How To UseRefreshing, fast-absorbing texture that locks in long-lasting hydration without greasiness.Apply appropriate amount of PDRN Pink Peptide Toner across entire face after cleansing and toningTap gently to enhance absorptionFor external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. *Read instructions and caution before use.IngredientsWater, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Xylitol, Sodium Citrate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Allatoin, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Adenosine, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Disodium Edta, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Cyanocobalamin, Rosa Damascena Extract, Sodium Dna, Gluconolactone, Prunus Mume Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Zea Mays (Corn) Leaf Extract, Copper Tripeptide-1, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Glycine, Glutamic Acid, Arginine.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Refreshing, fast-absorbing texture that locks in long-lasting hydration without greasiness.Apply appropriate amount of PDRN Pink Peptide Toner across entire face after cleansing and toningTap gently to enhance absorptionFor external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. *Read instructions and caution before use.

reviews.headline: Actual results
reviews.comments: I feel like I rarely see a chance but I notice my skin tone and texture becoming better after just a few uses and now that I'm through my first bottle and about to buy another I 10/10 recommend. I have dry sensitive skin & eczema and had no problems with irritation

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this again!
reviews.comments: Medicube is one of my favorite skincare products! This toner makes my face feel so soft and hydrated.

reviews.headline: ABSOLUTELY WORTH IT!!!
reviews.comments: LOVE IT!! OMG I highly recommend this to my friends, like I got a glow up!! I use in my morning skincare routine and night!

reviews.headline: Instantly broke me out!
reviews.comments: I am NOT acne prone by any means but THIS broke me out so bad after 1 use!
